name: SEXIT_IF
description: This is a process control command, i.e., it will control whether to exit from a SCAN loop. This is one part of a complete command structure.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: If the expression resolves to .T. then the program will transfer control to the line immediately following the appropriate ENDS (Endscan) command.

comments: For more information on the different structured programming commands, and the SEXIT_IF command in particular, please see Chapter 7, Structured Programming Commands.
program_editor: fiLe -> Mult rec cmds -> Scan -> exiT_if
